Business benefits

Focus on your own business
Focus on your own business
The ability to work without a website, product promotion, design, settings, SEO promotion, analytics, launching ads to attract additional customers, warehouse management and deal planning.
Audience access
Access to the audience
Direct access and contact with the audience of the avado.ca platform The ability to post articles, advertising campaigns for different periods and different geographic regions, new sales markets. Direct communication without an intermediary with the client in the chat. Virtual administrator and planner in your office.
Technological capabilities
Technological capabilities
The number of mobile users is growing in the world. On avado.ca you can create a profile of your business , and also use it to quickly access your mob account version. Thus, your business will always be "in front of" mobile clients, since it is impractical and expensive to create an application for your own business.
Seller ratings and customer reviews
Seller ratings and customer reviews
The ability to be the first and only, not just the first, but the only one in your niche. This is the main tool for attracting customers. Visiting Avado.ca helps you get more truthful reviews and improve search engine rankings.
Work safety
Labor safety
The avado.ca marketplace has no risk of virus infection from external sources. All business and customer data is hosted and stored on avado's secure servers. And also they are additionally saved thanks to backup and protected. Financial security and money transfer guarantee, in other words, a secure transaction.
Availability and quality
Availability and quality
Avado.ca provides quality and affordable business promotion services. The avado.ca team employs specialists from various fields - SEO, PPC advertising, content development, email marketing, etc.
Time
Time
Saving time on endless ad placement, saving resources for the office, saving resources for analyzing competitors, saving time on processing a client's request. You close the deal, we provide the platform.
Visual price
Money
You discover the value of the product. Become a visible supplier of the product.
